titles.title: To extend the minimum wage index established by regulation for each all-urban State under the Medicare inpatient hospital prospective payment system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/13/2007--Introduced. Extends the minimum wage index established by regulation for each all-urban state under the inpatient hospital prospective payment system (PPS) under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.
